alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 2:08AM CDT until June 10 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Van Buren affecting Sebastian and Crawford Counties. Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam affecting Logan, Franklin and Johnson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Van Buren. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs along the shoreline from the I-540 bridge east towards Lavaca. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.1 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
